attributes.action: Stop the Closure of our Parliament Street Post Office in Burnley Wood Burnley.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Burnley Wood has only this one Post Office through-out the area. Our Post Office is a MUCH used service to the community with its added value of an ATM machine. It most certainly shouldn't be closed. Many residents are disabled or Pensioners that can not walk the distance into the Town Centre Post Office.
